name: Cin of Cigma
description:
STORY

Play the unconventional role of the support character, Cin, and protect his ally, Dust in the arduous journey to restore Light to the World of Darkness.

CONTROLS
[LEFT]                           Lowers defense of hit enemy
[UP]                                Lowers attack of hit enemy
[RIGHT]                       Lowers speed of hit enemy
[DOWN]                     Teleports your ally, Dust to your location

[SPACEBAR]             Starts purification of downed enemy
[ARROW KEYS]      Enter the keys shown to purify

[F11]                              Toggle Fullscreen

CHEAT CODES (only for experimental use / in case of bugs)

[SHIFT + G]                God Mode, Player is Invincible
[SHIFT + H]                Increase HP
[SHIFT + M]               Increase MP
[SHIFT + K]                Kills All Enemies
[SHIFT + L]                 Kills Player
